ARABIC: لَهُمُ ٱلْبُشْرَىٰ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَفِى ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ لَا تَبْدِيلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: there is good news for them in the life of this world and in the Next World. There is no changing the words of Allah. That is the great victory!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For them is good news in the life of the world and in the life to come. There is no changing the words of God. That will be the great triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: For them are glad tidings in this world and in the Hereafter. The words of Allah shall not change. That is the supreme triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: will receive glad news both in this life and in the life hereafter. The words of God do not change. This alone is the supreme triumph
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: There are good tidings for them in the life of this world and in the Hereafter; the Words of Allah cannot change; this is the supreme success.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: For them is good news, in the life of the present world, and in the Hereafter. No change can there be in the Words of Allah. This is indeed the supreme success.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They shall have good news in this world's life and in the hereafter; there is no changing the words of Allah; that is the mighty achievement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: for them is good tidings in the present life and in the world to come. There is no changing the words of God; that is the mighty triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Theirs are good tidings in the life of the world and in the Hereafter - There is no changing the Words of Allah - that is the Supreme Triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: there is good news in this life and in the Hereafter: the Word of God shall never change. That is the supreme triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Unto them is glad tidings in the life of the world and in the Hereafter. No changing is there in the words of Allah. That! it is the mighty achievement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: For them is good news in the life of this world and in the Hereafter. (There is no altering the words of Allah.) That is the great success.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For them are glad tidings, in the life of the present and in the Hereafter; no change can there be in the words of Allah. This is indeed the supreme felicity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: For them are glad tidings, in the life of the present world (i.e. righteous dream seen by the person himself or shown to others), and in the Hereafter. No change can there be in the Words of Allah, this is indeed the supreme success.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: there is for them glad tidings in this present life and in the Everlasting Life. The Word of Allah is unchanging, that is the mighty triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: For them is good news in this life, and in the Hereafter. There is no alteration to the words of God. That is the supreme triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: For them are good tidings in the worldly life and in the Hereafter. No change is there in the words of Allah. That is what is the great attainment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:64] Theirs are good tidings in the life of this world: in a hadīth verified by al-Hākim this has been explained as [referring to] a propitious vision which an individual might have or [a vision] which another might have of that person; and in the Hereafter: Paradise and reward. There is no changing the Words of God, no failing of His promises; that, mentioned, is the supreme triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Theirs are good tidings in the life of the world) through good dream visions which they see or are seen in their favour (and in the Hereafter) by entering Paradise. (There is no changing the Words of Allah) that they will enter Paradise (that) good tiding (is the Supreme Triumph) the abounding salvation: they earn Paradise and all that is in it and are saved from hell and all that is in it.
